reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Assessment and Prioritisation of Smart Climate Change Mitigation Technologies in Turkish Cities - Pilot Project in Izmir Karsiyaka Municipality

description.narrative: The project aims to strengthen the capacity of Izmir/Karsiyaka municipality to prioritise and implement smart GHG (greenhouse gas) emissions mitigation technologies, through technology and know-how transfer from the UK. This will accelerate implementation of climate strategy and action plans in Turkey's cities.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
